trans-unit.source: Keeping a client can be more profitable than gaining a new one. That is one of the many reasons it is necessary to cultivate customer loyalty.
trans-unit.target: Menjaga klien lebih menguntungkan daripada mendapatkan pelanggan baru. Jadi, perlu untuk mengembangkan kesetiaan mereka, dengan kata lain untuk membuat mereka ingin kembali ke website Anda.

trans-unit.source: Word of mouth is also a means for getting new, satisfied clients. A dissatisfied customer can hurt your e-reputation and obstruct future sales goals.
trans-unit.target: Word of mouth is also a means to of getting new, satisfied clients; a dissatisfied one won't attract new clients.

trans-unit.source: In order to achieve this goal, you can organize:
trans-unit.target: Dalam rangka mencapai tujuan ini Anda dapat mengatur:

trans-unit.source: Punctual operations: commercial rewards (personalized special offers, product or service offered), non commercial rewards (priority handling of an order or a product), pecuniary rewards (bonds, discount coupons, payback).
trans-unit.target: Sasaran jangka panjang: commercial rewards (personalisasi penawaran khusus untuk produk maupun layanan), non commercial rewards (prioritas dalam penanganan order atau produk), pecuniary rewards (kupon diskon, cashback).

trans-unit.source: Sustainable operations: loyalty points or cards, which not only justify communication between merchant and client, but also offer advantages to clients (private offers, discounts).
trans-unit.target: Sasaran jangka pendek: poin loyalty atau kartu, yang tidak hanya melancarkan komunikasi antara penjual dan pembeli, tapi juga menawarkan keuntungal lain bagi pelanggan (penawaran khusus, diskon).

trans-unit.source: These operations encourage clients to buy products and visit your online store more regularly.
trans-unit.target: Operasi ini akan menganjurkan pelanggan untuk membeli produk dan mengunjungi toko Anda lebih sering lagi.
